Reviews.Title: Terrible: Don't buy!!
Reviews.Author: R. Parlanti "rosario3"
Reviews.Content: This item was a big let down, especially for the price I paid.  For its size, it could have its own internal hard drive storage, but you are limited to a microSD!!  Also the quality of the video was terrible, no audio, and the camera lens is a huge bug eye which alerts suspicion!Do not buy!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Perfect Hidden Camera for Home Security
Thermal Sensor Activates Built-In DVR and Saves Battery Power
8 Hours of Continuous Record Time / 100 Hours Standby Time
Infrared camera Can Capture Action In Very Low Light
ProductInfo.Name: Recluse Black Box Hidden Camera for Home Security
